message: Why do they call it 'falling in love'? Because gravity is a powerful force, I suppose.
Just finished my morning run. Feeling invigorated and ready to tackle the day.
Anyone else thinking about ordering pizza tonight? I can't decide between pepperoni or supreme.
My cat just brought me a leaf. I think she's trying to tell me something important.
Remember that time we tried to build a fort out of old blankets? Good times.
